#Requires AutoHotkey v2.0
#Include ../../../FindText.ahk
#Include ../Portal_Modules/LovePortalPosition.ahk

; Global variables
selectedPosition := "Start" ; Default starting position
WorldLoaded := "none"

; Image recognition patterns
Namek := "|<>*63$251."
Spirit := "|<>*58$203."
Double := "|<>*60$260."

; UI detection patterns
MatchStarted := "|<>*155$109."
VotingText := "|<>*93$74."

/**
 * Main function that waits for voting UI and then positions the character
 * @param {String} Position - The position to look toward after voting
 */
AwaitVotingUI(Position) {
    global selectedPosition
    selectedPosition := Position
    global WorldLoaded ; Track which world the player is in
    
    ; First detect which world is loaded
    DetectWorld()
    
    ; Then wait for voting UI and click "Yes"
    WaitForVotingUI()
    
    ; Finally, wait for match to start and position character
    WaitForMatchStart()
}

/**
 * Detects which world the player is in
 */
DetectWorld() {
    global WorldLoaded
    global Namek, Double, Spirit
    
    loop {
        if (ok := FindText(&X, &Y, 149-150000, 911-150000, 149+150000, 911+150000, 0, 0, Namek)) {
            WorldLoaded := "Namek"
            break
        } else if (ok := FindText(&X, &Y, 157-150000, 914-150000, 157+150000, 914+150000, 0, 0, Double)) {
            WorldLoaded := "DoubleDungeon"
            break
        } else if (ok := FindText(&X, &Y, 126-150000, 915-150000, 126+150000, 915+150000, 0, 0, Spirit)) {
            WorldLoaded := "Spirit"
            break
        }
        Sleep(100) ; Add a small delay to prevent high CPU usage
    }
}

/**
 * Waits for the voting UI to appear and clicks "Yes"
 */
WaitForVotingUI() {
    global VotingText
    
    loop {
        if (ok := FindText(&X, &Y, 918-150000, 105-150000, 918+150000, 105+150000, 0, 0, VotingText)) {
            BetterClick(881, 177) ; Clicks yes
            Sleep(200)
            break
        }
        Sleep(100) ; Add a small delay to prevent high CPU usage
    }
}

/**
 * Waits for the match to start and then positions character
 */
WaitForMatchStart() {
    global MatchStarted, selectedPosition
    
    loop {
        if !(ok := FindText(&X, &Y, 918-150000, 105-150000, 918+150000, 105+150000, 0, 0, VotingText)) {
            LookDown1(selectedPosition, WorldLoaded)
            break
        }
        Sleep(100) ; Add a small delay to prevent high CPU usage
    }
}
